thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 6 of 22
thread.title: JP

author: JP
title: JP
text: The ladies at LaserAway are all very friendly and honest. They do not try to over sell any of their products and have your best interest in mind. The RNs take the time to explain the treatment and take the time to listen and address any questions or concerns. I've only had 2 treatments thrus far and can see much improvement already and can not wait to see the final result. I highly recommend LaserAway to anyone who is interested in laser hair removal.
